company.name: International Institute for Applied Systems Analysis (IIASA)

profile_positions.company: International Institute for Applied Systems Analysis (IIASA)
profile_positions.description: Energy Program, working on the CD-LINKS project (Linking Climate and Development Policies - Leveraging International Networks and Knowledge Sharing). Specifically on representation of sustainable development goals in integrated assessment models.
profile_positions.title: Research Assistant

profile_positions.description:
Research and consultancy regarding the Earth system, climate change, sustainability, environment

Projects:
- Project coordination and research for a project on philanthropy, Institute for Sustainable Innovation & Development (INSID)
- Literature research on the role of gas in the energy transition and interviews regarding the German Energiewende, Stichting Energie Dialoog Nederland (EDN) 
- Literature research for a ‘road map green gas’, De Gemeynt
- Literature research for an essay on governance of the Dutch Wadden Sea, JPVS Sustainability Consulting
- Interviews and blogs about the American attitude towards climate, energy, and biodiversity, De Gemeynt
- Checking and writing texts about climate change for the website, Urgenda

Presentations:
- April 2014: Panel member, Book presentation “De Twijfelbrigade”, Amsterdam
- November 2013: Invited speaker (presented MSc thesis), VVM general meeting, Utrecht

Meetings:
- January 2014: Participant, NCSE conference "Building Climate Solutions", Washington DC
- July 2014: Selected participant, Potsdam Summer School “Arctic in the Anthropocene”, Potsdam
